h2_title: Second Sister Boss Fight and Guide
content: When she follows up her mad dance with a giant leap, roll forward to dodge under her slam, and you'll be able to pivot and unleash an attack of your own.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Second_Sister.md', within the main section titled 'The Second Sister', specifically from the subsection 'Second Sister Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When she follows up her mad dance with a giant leap, roll forward to dodge under her slam, and you'll be able to pivot and unleash an attack of your own.
